title.rendered: Japan Transocean Air in Naha, Japan

content.rendered:
Japan Transocean Air or JTA, is an airline based in Naha, Okinawa Prefecture, Japan. It operates domestic services on behalf of Japan Airlines. Its main base is Naha Airport. From 1967 until 1993, the airline was known as Southwest Air Lines.

The airline was established on 20 June 1967 as Southwest Air Lines, and started operations in July 1967. It changed its name in July 1993.

Japan Transocean Air in Naha, Japan Contact Address, Phone, Working hours and Website

Address: Naha, Okinawa Prefecture, Japan

Phone: NA

Email: NA

Working hours: NA

Japan Transocean Air Official website: https://jta-okinawa.com/

Types of Planes / Air craft available with Japan Transocean Air

Total fleet: 12

  • Boeing 737-800

Japan Transocean Air Baggage Allowance

View Japan Transocean Air Hand | Cabin baggage, Checked baggage, Excess baggage charges, over weight baggage charges, over size baggage charges in the above link.

Queries handled by Japan Transocean Air Customer care:

Schedule, eBooking, Rescheduling, Track and Trace, Charter Service Queries, Trucking service Queries, e-claims Flight Information, Missing Luggage, Delayed Flights. Pharma, pets, valuable, perishable goods and extra care shipment queries.

Is there any problem / complaint with reaching the Japan Transocean Air in Naha, Japan Address or Phone number? Please report any issues using the below comment form.

Rate your experience with the Japan Transocean Air in Naha, Japan: (click on the stars below)
